Reviews.Title: “Excellent room, great location and GREAT value”
Reviews.Author: ktfranks
Reviews.Content: stayed night february values ive hotel location excellent comfortable sights easy walking distance hotel significantly underrated hotel rated expensive ones floor view overlooking rome incredible highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Good Location!”
Reviews.Author: sarah j
Reviews.Content: 5 mins walk metro lots restaurants bars perfect location hotel clean breakfast simple nice slightly ok negative extremely hot air con wouldnt hotel staff extremely helpful wifi pc reception printer available free guests recommend hotel disabled lot steps hotel hill lift tight strip club door bother stay

Reviews.Title: “Overpriced!!! Not what we expected...”
Reviews.Author: Hadas E
Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights caprice hotel except lovely renovated didnt enjoy stay location convenient reach city center trevi piazza takes 20 minutes incline taxi time sorrounding theres via veneto expensive restaurants breakfast cold buffet eggs dry bread dry crossiant fresh cornflakes cofee yogurt preserved fruits reception hardly helpfull feels bother questions wouldt recommend hotels price

Reviews.Title: “good hotel”

Reviews.Content: negative impression entrance hotel renovated entrance reception surprised modern newly renovated clean negative charge 2 bottles water minibar price 8 euros receipt 4 euros rest tax

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Place. Great deal!”
Reviews.Author: Portland_and_beyond
Reviews.Content: bad reviews hotel caprice location near spanish steps near street 5 star hotels walking distance including metro yes strip club door didnt hear newly tastefully remodeled wonderful bathroom couldnt believe hotel price stay

Reviews.Content: reviews below negative middle refurbishing hotel floor left equipped typical hotels flat screen tv nice shower comfortable bed bits views vatican breakfast average trick location walking distance termini station spanish steps whilst upstairs lap dancing club bothered couldnt hear story tell stay cheap clean welcoming
